1.0.0.name: wordpress/db-twtpoll
1.0.0.description:
Twtpoll allows to easily create polls with your Twitter account.

Twtpoll offers the possibility to embed your polls in a website. To make this a little more easy in WordPress this plugin adds a little shortcode to embed your polls.

Usage

To embed a poll in your post just add the shortcode [twtpoll] with the attribute "id", e.g. [twtpoll id="d6iby3"]. If you don´t add the attribute "id" no poll will be displayed.
